[ I + adv/prep ] UK to search for something by moving things around with your hands, especially in a drawer, bag, or other closed space: ferret around I was just ferreting around in my drawer for my passport.
[ I ] to search for something or someone, by looking in many places or asking many questions: After a bit of ferreting, I managed to find his address.
